StoredProcedureOraclev10g.name: DELETEFACULTY
StoredProcedureOraclev10g.source: CREATE OR REPLACE PROCEDURE GRUPO10.DELETEFACULTY(pName IN VARCHAR2) AS&lt;br/&gt;BEGIN&lt;br/&gt; DELETE FROM Faculty_table faculty&lt;br/&gt; WHERE faculty.name = pName;&lt;br/&gt; COMMIT;&lt;br/&gt;END deleteFaculty;
